SELECT a.x, a.y , SQRT( POWER(( #{latitude} - y) * 110979.309, 2) + POWER(( #{longitude} - x) * 88907.949, 2) ) z , a.site_id, a.type_no, a.site_name, a.address, a.start_date, a.site_status FROM site a, (SELECT #{latitude} v_x ,#{longitude} v_y ,110979.309 r_x ,88907.949 r_y ,1000000.000 v_z FROM dual ) WHERE SQRT( POWER((v_x - a.y) * r_x, 2) + POWER((v_y - a.x) * r_y, 2) ) <= v_z AND a.y BETWEEN v_x - v_z / r_x AND v_x + v_z / r_x AND a.x BETWEEN v_y - v_z / r_y AND v_y + v_z / r_y ORDER BY a.site_status desc, z
